item.description:
April 25th for a trip the Hollis Flea Markets. Start the day with breakfast at Joeys 8:30-9:30.
Exit 7 West off Everett Turnpike then follow Route 101A west.
Joey's is on your right just after the Amherst line
(2 blocks beyond the Harley-Davidson dealership )

Come and have breakfast, coffee or just meet by 9:30. At approxiamately 9:30; we will leave the restaurant and go to the flea markets in Hollis on Rte 122. Spend a few of hours poking around at looking at the treasures to be found.

All is based on a nice day. Rain cancels the excusion.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Hollis Flea Markets
